sect1.title: $use_include_path
sect1.para: This tells smarty to respect the include_path FIXME: within the File Template Resource handler within the File Template Resource handler to resolve the directories known to $template_dir.

note.title: Note
note.para: This is a backward compatibility option. You should not design your applications to rely on the include_path, as this may - depending on your implementation - slow down your system (and Smarty) considerably.
